This is a document that display the concessions made by the United States to Brazil during the different round of the GATT. The list is not exhaustive as only relevant item are put into the table. The list of excluded item can be found at the end of the document.
The tariffs concessions are displayed by round.

The round Geneva I
================

```{r}
tariffs <- matrix(c(2141, 0, 811010, 33, 81110110, 33, 81110120, 30, 8110450, 38, 1770, 0, 2220, 0, 0940, 30, 8127, 20, 2260, 50, 1423, 0, 2290, 50, 55608, 0, 55609, 46, 5510, 50, 6211, 50, 42020, 33, 42025, 33, 42028, 50, 42021, 33, 1330, 48, 1356, 50, 1357, 50, 2231, 0, 1420, 50, 3965, 50, 595558, 0, 595559, 50, 03340, 0, 03341, 40, 03351, 0, 3410, 50, 2202, 0, 2210, 0, 5120, 0, 15101, 0, 1511, 0, 0728, 0, 2170, 0, 2171, 0, 2014, 0, 6270, 0, 2239, 0, 2280, 0, 2257, 0, 2255, 0, 0295, 0, 0293, 0, 0299, 0, 1225, 0, 0974, 0, 2252, 0, 4204, 0, 4031, 0, 4032, 0, 4033, 0, 4202, 50, 4204, 0), ncol=2, byrow=TRUE)
```
